thread.title: Pakistan opt to bat in opening Test against England
thread.title_full: Pakistan opt to bat in opening Test against England - Sports

author: ANI
title: Pakistan opt to bat in opening Test against England
text:
Abu Dhabi: Pakistan won the toss and opted to bat first in the first Test of the three-match series against England, here at Sheikh Zayed Stadium on Tuesday.
Yasir Shah has been ruled out of the series after suffering a back injury during a training session . Right-arm seamer Imran Khan replaced Yasir in the eleven-man squad.
Meanwhile, all-rounder Shoaib Malik has been recalled to the Pakistan Test team after a five-year gap.
On the England side, Steven Finn was ruled out of the squad due to a left-foot injury.
Besides the three Tests, Pakistan will also play four ODIs and three T20s against England.
Pakistan squad: Mohammad Hafeez, Shan Masood, Shoaib Malik, Younis Khan, Misbah-ul-Haq (captain), Asad Shafiq, Sarfraz AhmedÂ¿, Wahab Riaz, Zulfiqar Babar, Rahat Ali, Imran Khan
England squad: Alastair Cook(captain ), Moeen Ali, Ian Bell, Joe Root, Jonny Bairstow, Ben Stokes, Jos Buttler , Adil Rashid, Stuart Broad, Mark Wood, James Anderson.
